title: GetPropertyReference (Method)
text:
METHOD GetPropertyReference : CmpBACnet.IEC_BACNET_STATUS
Gets the device object property reference at index nIndex in the List_Of-Object_Property_References-Property of this BACnet-Object.

rows.Name: nIndex
rows.Comment: The 1 based index of the reference to get.

rows.Name: devObjPropRef
rows.Comment:
The object property reference gotten after a call to this
method.
